name: You Do Jump
description:
You Do Jump is a game about rules, however, luckily you have some controls over what rules are and are not allowed. 

Made for the Unofficial Playdate Jam in 72 hours (Theme: Etiquette)

Inspired by Uurnog and Baba Is You, in this game you can put together and take apart sets of blocks to control how you interact with the environment.

Controls:

Left, Right - Move

Up - Jump

Down - Pickup Blocks

X - Throw Blocks

Z - Restart Level

I had a lot of fun making this, which is my first real project in Love2D. I'm very excited about the Playdate, and look forward to working further on this project and adapting it to the actual Playdate hardware!
